summary: Test module that validates the I2VGenXL video generation pipeline from the Diffusers library. It provides a fast test suite checking core functionality, attention handling, output formats, batch inference consistency, hardware offloading, component serialization, and compatibility with alternative attention implementations, as well as a slower integration test suite for comprehensive end‑to‑end verification.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, performance, and correctness of the I2VGenXL video synthesis pipeline across different hardware configurations and attention mechanisms, supporting downstream applications that depend on high‑quality video generation.
